channel.title: [Classic returns] Server/client source packs [! bringing up old sources !]
channel.description:
Hello everyone. Il be nice and short. Recently i was cleaning up my PC and i came across some really old RSPS sources, so i tought: "why coudnt i post them here?" Well, yeah, i'm posting them here as you might have guessed already.
[b]Package 1[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] !!Contains only 508 server sources!! This package contains few of mine server versions (HugoScape, HugoScape v2) and others sources. Bassicaly, in my source there are some things that i think noone has ATM, like it has some brutal Party room and cool toogle - pvp on/off (on whole world, but not yet finished) scrips. [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *Butterscape *HugoScape - alot of its backups included *HugoScape v2 - 1 backup included *Bulbys *autorestarter for 508 servers [i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i] [URL=http://img23.imageshack.us/my.php?image=st4w.jpg][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/641/st4w.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img24.imageshack.us/my.php?image=7st.jpg][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/1521/50318853.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=50318853.jpg][IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/2964/7st.jpg[/img][/URL] [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/O3FUK1YR/package1.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/O3FUK1YR/package1.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 2[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Contains few of mine (latvianscape, elementscape), client and other sources, basically goes on 317. [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *Elementscape *Latvianscape - backups included *Teh IceRealm Client *Allstar-Scape v1 [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/DE9U03FR/package2.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/DE9U03FR/package2.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 3[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Usefull tools for server developers and hosters. [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *some cool models *The_Flames_Cheatpack - contains autoclickers, spammers, fighters, buyers and all other macros. *JAR Maker *Model viewer (RSMV) *Autorestarter that works with 508 *GnuWin32 [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/ZDTVL0J7/package3.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/ZDTVL0J7/package3.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 4[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Contains old 317 server sources (and 1 client i think) [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *Got-Skillz V 7.3 Update With Compiler *Philosopher Isle *Philosopher isle (big client.java) *Philosopher Isle Client *Project-DS v.5 open source *Satan's dominion v.3 *Raul's Server [i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/f3fce441b7.jpg[/img][/url] [URL=http://img5.imageshack.us/my.php?image=77778353.jpg][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/8232/77778353.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img5.imageshack.us/my.php?image=10582801.jpg][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/292/10582801.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot32i.png][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/217/screenshot32i.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot39h.png][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5599/screenshot39h.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot49.png][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4951/screenshot49.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=servpicskl2.png][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=servpicskl2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=v51.jpg][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=v51.jpg[/img][/URL] [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/0HN6WJ8F/package4.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/0HN6WJ8F/package4.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 5[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Contains old 317 server sources (+ 1 client). [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *Cereal v1(silab) *Desolated Isle *Desolated Isle Client *Server Base Evo Alpha *sozscape v.10 *tablon islev1 [i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0188/Untitled6][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0188/Untitled6.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0099/Untitled_3][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0099/Untitled_3.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0502/Untitled2][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0502/Untitled2.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0900/Untitled3][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0900/Untitled3.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0701/pkzone][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0701/pkzone.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0608/start][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0608/start.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0007/Untitled4][img]http://f.imagehost.org/0007/Untitled4.jpg[/img][/url] [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/FDH1V2RZ/package5.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/FDH1V2RZ/package5.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 6[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Contains old 317 server sources. [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *CHEEZSCAPE_UPDATE80[1].SOURCE *rooneyscape *Copy of DuhPK Scape *Golden Paradise v2 *RS2LegendzPkz [i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0057/11_4][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0057/11_4.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0593/120106][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0593/120106.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0892/120117][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0892/120117.jpg[/img][/url] [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/NACV81MK/package6.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/NACV81MK/package6.rar.html[/url]
[b]Package 7[/b] [i][b]Short:[/b][/i] Contains old 317 server sources. [i][b]Contains:[/b][/i] *FazeScape *gun-n-ose *P-R *rooneyscape v2 *ServerRemix *WeedScape [i][b]Screenshots:[/b][/i] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0998/ownageshopxs9][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0998/ownageshopxs9.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0311/startingpointhj9][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0311/startingpointhj9.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://f.imagehost.org/view/0210/untitled4][img]http://f.imagehost.org/t/0210/untitled4.jpg[/img][/url] [i][b]Download link[/b][/i] [url=http://uploading.com/files/PXS9UDAX/package7.rar.html]http://uploading.com/files/PXS9UDAX/package7.rar.html[/url]
[b]Credits:[/b] 1. Source authors 2. Me for creating these packs
If you downloaded any of these files, please post feedback.
[b]Scans:[/b] [URL=http://img18.imageshack.us/my.php?image=72015771.jpg][IMG]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/8045/72015771.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
__________________________________________MORE PACKS COMING SOON__________________________________________

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“wizascape, post:6, topic:278037”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=366987.msg2781012#msg2781012 date=1241867890]
they look good i guess but why is your name differant in like all of them? shouuldnt you have the same name in all pics?
[/quote]
They aren’t mine (most of them), that’s why i have different names, i’m just bringing up old sources for you to use and i shall continue doing it.

they’re to little takes a while to see them all…

Made bigger pics.[/quote]
oooo kk thanks it just seemed weird thats all^^

item.title: [Classic returns] Server/client source packs [! bringing up old sources !]
item.dc:creator: @wizascape wizascape
item.description:
@wizascape wrote:

Hello everyone. Il be nice and short. Recently i was cleaning up my PC and i came across some really old RSPS sources, so i tought: “why coudnt i post them here?” Well, yeah, i’m posting them here as you might have guessed already.

Package 1
Short:
!!Contains only 508 server sources!!
This package contains few of mine server versions (HugoScape, HugoScape v2) and others sources. Bassicaly, in my source there are some things that i think noone has ATM, like it has some brutal Party room and cool toogle - pvp on/off (on whole world, but not yet finished) scrips.
Contains:
*Butterscape
*HugoScape - alot of its backups included
*HugoScape v2 - 1 backup included
*Bulbys
*autorestarter for 508 servers
Screenshots:



Download link
http://uploading.com/files/O3FUK1YR/package1.rar.html

Package 2
Short:
Contains few of mine (latvianscape, elementscape), client and other sources, basically goes on 317.
Contains:
*Elementscape
*Latvianscape - backups included
*Teh IceRealm Client
*Allstar-Scape v1
Download link
http://uploading.com/files/DE9U03FR/package2.rar.html

Package 3
Short:
Usefull tools for server developers and hosters.
Contains:
*some cool models
*The_Flames_Cheatpack - contains autoclickers, spammers, fighters, buyers and all other macros.
*JAR Maker
*Model viewer (RSMV)
*Autorestarter that works with 508
*GnuWin32
Download link
http://uploading.com/files/ZDTVL0J7/package3.rar.html

Package 4
Short:
Contains old 317 server sources (and 1 client i think)
Contains:
*Got-Skillz V 7.3 Update With Compiler
*Philosopher Isle
*Philosopher isle (big client.java)
*Philosopher Isle Client
*Project-DS v.5 open source
*Satan’s dominion v.3
*Raul’s Server
Screenshots:








Download link
http://uploading.com/files/0HN6WJ8F/package4.rar.html

Package 5
Short:
Contains old 317 server sources (+ 1 client).
Contains:
*Cereal v1(silab)
*Desolated Isle
*Desolated Isle Client
*Server Base Evo Alpha
*sozscape v.10
*tablon islev1
Screenshots:







Download link
http://uploading.com/files/FDH1V2RZ/package5.rar.html

Package 6
Short:
Contains old 317 server sources.
Contains:
*CHEEZSCAPE_UPDATE80[1].SOURCE
*rooneyscape
*Copy of DuhPK Scape
*Golden Paradise v2
*RS2LegendzPkz
Screenshots:

Download link
http://uploading.com/files/NACV81MK/package6.rar.html

Package 7
Short:
Contains old 317 server sources.
Contains:
*FazeScape
*gun-n-ose
*P-R
*rooneyscape v2
*ServerRemix
*WeedScape
Screenshots:

Download link
http://uploading.com/files/PXS9UDAX/package7.rar.html

Credits:

  1. Source authors
  2. Me for creating these packs

If you downloaded any of these files, please post feedback.

Scans:

MORE PACKS COMING SOON
